summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening and establishment of 5th Ave. Northeast between Northeast 92nd Street and Northeast 125th Street at existing grade; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; providing for the acquisition of the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on certain abutting properties; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for storm sewer purposes in connection therewith; and providing for payment from the City Street Fund.
